general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.text1: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the 'Policy') describes how Netowork (hereinafter referred to as 'We', 'Our Company') collects, uses, and protects users' personal data (hereinafter referred to as 'You', 'User') when using the Netowork.com website and related services.
general.text2: By using our service, you agree to the terms of this Policy.

data_collection.title: 2. Data Collection and Usage
data_collection.text: We may collect the following types of information:
items: IP address, browser, and device data

data_sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing with Third Parties
data_sharing.text: We do not sell or share personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
items: When required by law or government authorities
For analytics services (Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity)
To ensure Netowork operates via partner services

data_protection.title: 4. Data Protection
data_protection.text: We take measures to protect your data from leaks, unauthorized access, and alterations. However, 100% security on the internet cannot be guaranteed.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.text: Our service uses cookies to enhance user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.text1: You have the right to request information about stored data, correct or delete it, and withdraw consent for data processing.

changes.title: 7. Changes to the Policy
changes.text: We may update this Policy, and the current version will always be available on Netowork.com.
